thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect in every way!
thread.title_full: Perfect in every way! - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Helena L
title: Perfect in every way!
text: We spent a weekend here with our 1 year old son, and everything was just perfect. It was within minutes walk from tube (piccadilly, district, circle, hammersmith & city lines) and bus stations, with plenty of good restaurants nearby. The hotel itself was new, modern, clean and spacious. Breakfast was excellent with many choices. There was even a microwave available 24/7 for guests to use! Special thanks to hotel staff Monica and Menino, who were smiley, friendly, polite and very helpful. We will definitely stay here again in future!
